casebody.data:
The BRONX HOUSEHOLD OF FAITH, et al., petitioners,
v.
BOARD OF EDUCATION OF the CITY OF NEW YORK, et al. No. 14-354. Supreme Court of the United States March 30, 2015.

Opinion

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice SOTOMAYORtook no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
